Title: Norman Saves the World
Writer: Mike Binder, David Sonnenborn, Ann Biderman (created by), Miki Johnson (story editor), David Sonnenborn (staff writer)
Actors: Liev Schreiber, Paula Malcomson, Eddie Marsan, Dash Mihok
Plot: Ray has a confrontation with a Hollywood agent and a former fixer; without the protection of the Russians, Ray helps Mickey secure his own safety.
